sentences.sContent: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.sContent_eng: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.sCn: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.sContent: Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.sCn: 要是真象你所想的那样，那他们干吗不到苏格兰去呢？

phrases.pCn: n. 苏格兰场（伦敦警察厅）
（苏格兰正式定为国教的）苏格兰长老会
